arts.ttl: Andreas Christensen talks Rashford, Yamal, Flick, his future, atmosphere at St James’ Park ahead of Barcelona vs Newcastle United
arts.sum: After a rather good start to the 2025-26 season, FC Barcelona are going to play another important game tonight as they face Newcastle United in the opening game of their UEFA Champions League campaign.
